content.text: As a UI Designer/Engineer at the New York Federal Reserve, I worked on designing and developing secure, accessible, and user-friendly interfaces for internal and public-facing financial tools. Maintained confidential security clearance. Collaborated with economists, analysts, and security teams to ensure compliance with financial regulations and best practices for usability.

Designed and implemented interactive data visualizations for economic reports. Worked with large datasets to create dynamic charts and dashboards, improving accessibility and clarity for policymakers and the public.

Developed UI components for secure financial applications used internally for analysis and decision-making. Ensured compliance with strict security standards while maintaining usability and performance.
